name: Void in Capital
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING The controls are WASD and mouse with click. Spacebar progresses text The potions heal me and hurt others. Perfect. I am doing what is correct. My king, the king. I am forsaken. I must win you back. I am not okay. You must give me your approval. You gave me a task, to get the rubies and emeralds from a nearby town. The capital is what we need. We need more.

NOTE: please forgive any lag or bugs you might find, this is a game jam game that i made in 72 hours. Also, for the full experience please download the game instead of playing browser because the shader code I wrote seems to not work in browser and you will be more susceptible to lag.

art pack used: https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles

please follow me on mastodon or support me on KoFi:

  • Mastodon
  • KoFi

thank you and have a nice day
